metadata.title: CVE-2018-17432 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference in H5O_sdspace_encode() in H5Osdspace.c in theHDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via a crafted HDF5 file.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
